services.title: In-Store Shopping
services.description: Enjoy a smooth shopping experience with neatly arranged aisles and friendly staff ready to assist you.

services.title: Home Delivery
services.description: Get your groceries delivered right to your doorstep - fresh, fast, and hassle-free.

services.title: Customer Assistance
services.description: Our friendly team is always available to help with product choices, billing, or general support.

services.title: Fresh Produce Section
services.description: Choose from a wide variety of fresh fruits, vegetables, and daily essentials, carefully sourced for quality.

services.title: Bulk Purchase Support
services.description: Buy in bulk for families, events, or businesses with special pricing and easy pickup options.

services.title: Loyalty & Rewards Program
services.description: Earn points every time you shop and enjoy exclusive member discounts and special offers.
